newsitem.title: MEXICO: GE Capital offers to buy Mexican insurance firm.
newsitem.headline: GE Capital offers to buy Mexican insurance firm.

text.p: General Electric Capital Assurance Co. said Monday it was seeking to buy 99.99 percent of Mexican insurance firm Seguros del Centro.

In a statement released by the Mexican Stock Exchange, the U.S. firm said the purchase of the 2,449,999 shares in question would be carried out by a public offer which opened on December 6 and closes on December 20.
It said it was offering 43.0524 pesos per share in an operation carried out via brokerage Inverlat.
Once the purchase is complete, it will ask for Seguros del Centro shares trading on the Mexican stock exchange to be cancelled.
